#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
#include<math.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    long long int l,b,h,temp1,temp2;
    double result;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%lld%lld%lld",&l,&b,&h);
        temp1=l;
        if(temp1<b)
        {
            l=b;
            b=temp1;
            temp1=l;
        }
        if(temp1<h)
        {
            l=h;
            h=temp1;
        }
        temp1=2*b*h;
        l=l*l;
        b=b*b;
        h=h*h;
        temp2=l+b+h+temp1;
        result=sqrt(temp2);
        printf("%lf\n",result);
    }
    return 0;
}
